summary:
## PHP: A Web Building Block

PHP is a popular computer language used to build websites. Created in 1993, it's now used by 76.2% of websites. PHP stands for "PHP: Hypertext Preprocessor" and works with web servers to create dynamic web pages. It can also be used for other tasks, like controlling drones.

The PHP language is free and works on many different systems. Despite lacking a formal rulebook, it has become a standard for web development. However, some older versions are still used and might be insecure.
title: PHP
